name: Pervacio
overview: Pervacio, Inc. owns and operates a Web-based mobile device management platform that offers a suite of applications, features, services, and agents for managing various types of mobile phones and handheld devices. Its platform offers Data Wipe that helps IT personnel to prepare mobile devices for disposal or redeployment; a backup and restore application that is used to back-up data from a mobile device; Software Manager, a solution for deploying applications, managing application upgrades, and applying critical patches; Asset Manager that enables organizations to track, monitor, and manage hardware and software assets; and Configuration Manager, which enables administrators and end users to configure, deploy, and maintain standard device settings. The companyâ€™s platform also provides Content Manager that enables the delivery of critical business documents to mobile devices; a remote control solution; a help desk application that enables service providers and enterprises to provide real-time support to their users; Alert Manager, which enables administrators to monitor device and application level alerts in real-time; and a security and policy management solution. In addition, its platform offers various features and services, which include over-the-air provisioning, third-party application management, automated log collection, scripting and remote execution, no-touch device reset recovery, pro-active device monitoring, path and update management, zero-touch content sharing, enterprise integration, and connectivity support. The company serves service providers, device manufacturers, and enterprises. Pervacio, Inc. was founded in 2004 and is based in Bethesda, Maryland.
